custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Koroneiki_Account.accountId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM Koroneiki_Account INNER JOIN Koroneiki_ContactAccountRole ON Koroneiki_ContactAccountRole.accountId = Koroneiki_Account.accountId WHERE Koroneiki_ContactAccountRole.contactId = ?

SELECT DISTINCT {Koroneiki_Account.*} FROM Koroneiki_Account INNER JOIN Koroneiki_ContactAccountRole ON Koroneiki_ContactAccountRole.accountId = Koroneiki_Account.accountId WHERE Koroneiki_ContactAccountRole.contactId = ?

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Koroneiki_Contact.contactId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM Koroneiki_Contact [$JOIN$] WHERE [$WHERE$] (Koroneiki_Contact.firstName LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (Koroneiki_Contact.middleName LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (Koroneiki_Contact.lastName LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (Koroneiki_Contact.emailAddress LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT DISTINCT {Koroneiki_Contact.*} FROM Koroneiki_Contact [$JOIN$] WHERE [$WHERE$] (Koroneiki_Contact.firstName LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (Koroneiki_Contact.middleName LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (Koroneiki_Contact.lastName LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (Koroneiki_Contact.emailAddress LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])
INNER JOIN Koroneiki_ContactAccountRole ON Koroneiki_ContactAccountRole.contactId = Koroneiki_Contact.contactId WHERE Koroneiki_ContactAccountRole.accountId = ?
INNER JOIN Koroneiki_ContactTeamRole ON Koroneiki_ContactTeamRole.contactId = Koroneiki_Contact.contactId WHERE Koroneiki_ContactTeamRole.teamId = ?
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Koroneiki_ContactRole.contactRoleId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM Koroneiki_ContactRole [$JOIN$] WHERE [$WHERE$] ( (Koroneiki_ContactRole.name LIKE ?) OR (? IS NULL) )
SELECT {Koroneiki_ContactRole.*} FROM Koroneiki_ContactRole [$JOIN$] WHERE [$WHERE$] ( (Koroneiki_ContactRole.name LIKE ?) OR (? IS NULL) ) ORDER BY Koroneiki_ContactRole.name

INNER JOIN Koroneiki_ContactAccountRole ON Koroneiki_ContactAccountRole.contactRoleId = Koroneiki_ContactRole.contactRoleId WHERE (Koroneiki_ContactAccountRole.accountId = ?) AND (Koroneiki_ContactAccountRole.contactId = ?)

LEFT JOIN Koroneiki_ContactAccountRole ON Koroneiki_ContactAccountRole.contactRoleId = Koroneiki_ContactRole.contactRoleId LEFT JOIN Koroneiki_ContactTeamRole ON Koroneiki_ContactTeamRole.contactRoleId = Koroneiki_ContactRole.contactRoleId WHERE (Koroneiki_ContactAccountRole.contactId = ?) OR (Koroneiki_ContactTeamRole.contactId = ?)

INNER JOIN Koroneiki_ContactTeamRole ON Koroneiki_ContactTeamRole.contactRoleId = Koroneiki_ContactRole.contactRoleId WHERE (Koroneiki_ContactTeamRole.teamId = ?) AND (Koroneiki_ContactTeamRole.contactId = ?)
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Koroneiki_Team.teamId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM Koroneiki_Team [$JOIN$] WHERE [$WHERE$] (Koroneiki_Team.name LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])
SELECT DISTINCT {Koroneiki_Team.*} FROM Koroneiki_Team [$JOIN$] WHERE [$WHERE$] (Koroneiki_Team.name LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])
INNER JOIN Koroneiki_TeamAccountRole ON Koroneiki_TeamAccountRole.teamId = Koroneiki_Team.teamId WHERE Koroneiki_TeamAccountRole.accountId = ?
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Koroneiki_TeamRole.teamRoleId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM Koroneiki_TeamRole [$JOIN$] WHERE [$WHERE$] ( (Koroneiki_TeamRole.name LIKE ?) OR (? IS NULL) )
SELECT {Koroneiki_TeamRole.*} FROM Koroneiki_TeamRole [$JOIN$] WHERE [$WHERE$] ( (Koroneiki_TeamRole.name LIKE ?) OR (? IS NULL) ) ORDER BY Koroneiki_TeamRole.name
INNER JOIN Koroneiki_TeamAccountRole ON Koroneiki_TeamAccountRole.teamRoleId = Koroneiki_TeamRole.teamRoleId WHERE (Koroneiki_TeamAccountRole.accountId = ?) AND (Koroneiki_TeamAccountRole.teamId = ?)
